name: CGFunction
desc: A general facility for defining and using callback functions.

items.name: init?(info: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?, domainDimension: Int, domain: UnsafePointer<CGFloat>?, rangeDimension: Int, range: UnsafePointer<CGFloat>?, callbacks: UnsafePointer<CGFunctionCallbacks>)
struct CGFunctionCallbacks
items.desc: A structure that contains callbacks needed by a CGFunctionRef object.

items.name: typealias CGFunctionEvaluateCallback
items.desc: Performs custom operations on the supplied input data to produce output data.

items.name: typealias CGFunctionReleaseInfoCallback
items.desc: Performs custom clean-up tasks when Core Graphics deallocates a CGFunctionRef object.

items.name: class var typeID: CFTypeID
items.desc: Returns the type identifier for Core Graphics function objects.
